## ğŸ“¦ Downloads

Choose the appropriate package for your platform:

### gocron (Web Server)
- **Linux AMD64**: `gocron-vX.X.X-linux-amd64.tar.gz`
- **Linux ARM64**: `gocron-vX.X.X-linux-arm64.tar.gz`
- **macOS AMD64**: `gocron-vX.X.X-darwin-amd64.tar.gz`
- **macOS ARM64**: `gocron-vX.X.X-darwin-arm64.tar.gz`
- **Windows AMD64**: `gocron-vX.X.X-windows-amd64.zip`
- **Windows ARM64**: `gocron-vX.X.X-windows-arm64.zip`

### gocron-node (Task Agent)
- **Linux AMD64**: `gocron-node-vX.X.X-linux-amd64.tar.gz`
- **Linux ARM64**: `gocron-node-vX.X.X-linux-arm64.tar.gz`
- **macOS AMD64**: `gocron-node-vX.X.X-darwin-amd64.tar.gz`
- **macOS ARM64**: `gocron-node-vX.X.X-darwin-arm64.tar.gz`
- **Windows AMD64**: `gocron-node-vX.X.X-windows-amd64.zip`
- **Windows ARM64**: `gocron-node-vX.X.X-windows-arm64.zip`

## ğŸš€ Quick Start

1. Download the appropriate packages for your platform
2. Extract the archives
3. Run `./gocron web` to start the web server
4. Run `./gocron-node` to start the task agent
5. Visit http://localhost:5920 to access the web interface

For detailed installation and configuration instructions, please refer to the [README](https://github.com/gocronx-team/gocron/blob/main/README.md).
